com.paydiant.android.core.service

Class SecurityManagerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.service.SecurityManagerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISecurityManagerService

    public class SecurityManagerService
extends Object
implements ISecurityManagerService
    The Service Class for the security manager.

    Warning: DO NOT reference the core.service package classes directly as these are missing the required business functionalities. Use core.facade or ui.service classes instead.

    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SecurityManagerService()
      Default constructor for Security Manager Service The constructor creates instance of the service and retrieves the single instance of the rest template from the RestTemplateContainer and assigns it to the restTemplate instance variable.
